titles.title: Affordable Child Care Act
Affordable Child Care Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to double the value of certain tax benefits relating to children and dependents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Affordable Child Care Act
This bill increases certain tax benefits for children and taxpayer dependents. Specifically, it doubles the amount of employment-related expenses that may be taken into account for the tax credit.
